title.narrative: COMMS AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: Country offices benefit from quality assurance and TA on programme strategies (advocacy, Communication for Development (C4D) and communication) and strengthened partnerships., which contributes to Policy, Guidance And Technical Support For Country Programming And Reporting, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF MENARO advises and supports country offices to develop and implement country programmes that achieve results for children and adolescents, particularly for the most disadvantaged girls and boys in development and humanitarian contexts

sector.narrative: HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas

related-activity.ref: 234R/A0/09/002 DE-COS IMPLEMENT CPS FOCUSSED ON RESULTS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Country offices benefit from quality assurance and TA on programme strategies (advocacy, C4D and communication) and strengthenedpartnerships.

description.narrative: Position UNICEF as the credible voice of MENA's children among a diverse and wide circle of audiences; strengthen social and behavior change programming in country offices. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:08/08/2017
